text: The 2018 Lilly Diabetes 250 was a NASCAR Xfinity Series race held on September 10, 2018 at Indianapolis Motor Speedway in Speedway, Indiana. Contested over 100 laps on the speedway, it was the 25th race of the 2018 NASCAR Xfinity Series season. ==Entry list== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%" |- ! ! Driver ! Team !
